perturbation.original_text: This term of this Agreement and the rights and obligations of the Parties hereto shall commence as of the Effective Date and shall continue in perpetuity (the “Term”), unless terminated earlier in accordance with the provisions contained herein.
perturbation.changed_text: This term of this Agreement and the rights and obligations of the Parties hereto shall commence as of the Effective Date and shall continue for five (5) years (the “Term”), unless terminated earlier in accordance with the provisions contained herein.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Term' is initially defined as 'in perpetuity'. This change modifies it to a fixed five-year period, creating a contradiction within the document itself. Other clauses that reference the 'Term' now have conflicting interpretations.

perturbation.original_text:
CHT shall, in good faith and at its own expense:
(i)
market, advertise, promote and re-license the use of the Ehave Companion Solution to End Users located in the Territory
consistent with good business practice, provided that CHT shall have full discretion as to where in the Territory it
chooses to do so at any time and from time to time;
perturbation.changed_text:
CHT shall, in good faith and at its own expense:
(i)
market, advertise, promote and re-license the use of the Ehave Companion Solution to End Users located in specific regions of the Territory as directed by Ehave, consistent with good business practice, provided that CHT shall not have full discretion as to where in the Territory it chooses to do so at any time and from time to time;
perturbation.explanation: In section 5(a)(i), CHT originally has full discretion over where it markets within the territory. The modified text removes 'full discretion' and instead requires CHT to market in specific regions as directed by Ehave. This directly contradicts the original provision.

perturbation.original_text:
Ehave shall implement and maintain those safeguards and controls set out in Schedule “5” to deter and for the detection, prevention and
correction of any unauthorized intrusion, access or use of the Ehave Companion Solution, as well as to protect against any loss, theft or
unauthorized access, use, disclosure, copying, or modification of End User Data.
perturbation.changed_text:
Ehave shall implement only those safeguards and controls explicitly mandated by law to deter and for the detection, prevention and
correction of any unauthorized intrusion, access or use of the Ehave Companion Solution, as well as to protect against any loss, theft or
unauthorized access, use, disclosure, copying, or modification of End User Data. Schedule 5 is for informational purposes only and is not binding.
perturbation.explanation: This change contradicts the original text by stating that only safeguards mandated by law will be implemented, and explicitly stating that schedule 5 is non-binding. The original version mandated the safeguards described in schedule 5 be implemented and maintained.
